protocol.name: P-G8934-1
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water.  Seeds were stratified at 4ËšC for 2 days before being planted on standard media.  Standard media is 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 0.5g/L MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH.  Nylon mesh was placed on top of the solidified media and seeds were evenly placed on the mesh.

protocol.name: P-G8934-2
protocol.text: Samples were prepared as in Birnbaum et al. (2005) Nat. Methods for roots grown under standard conditions.

protocol.name: P-G8934-3
protocol.text: Fragmented cRNA probes were prepared using the two-cycle amplification protocol by Affymetrix.

protocol.name: P-G8934-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using the RNAeasy Micro Kit (Qiagen GmbH).
